listRules.one: The player's task is to compose a new word from existing letters by adding one new one.
listRules.two: Letters can be selected in any direction, but not diagonally.
listRules.four: The same cell cannot be used twice in a word.
listRules.five: The longer the word, the more points: for each letter, one point.
listRules.six: The player with the most points wins. The one who cannot come up with a word loses.

move.one: Select a cell in the field and insert a new letter into it.
move.two: Create a word by clicking on the letters continuously, in the order they are written. The word must include a new letter.
move.tree: Confirm the word. If a mistake was made, cancel it.

help.start: The game starts with a start word, which is randomly selected by the computer.
help.points: The longer the word, the more points you get. For each letter - one point. When skipping a move, the player does not receive points.
